title: KOHLER K-99898-CP Awaken G110 Premium Slidebar Kit, Polished Chrome
features: Awaken Multifunction Hand shower, 2.0 gpm, G110
Master Shower Metal Hand shower Hose, 60"
Hand shower features three spray modes plus a water-saving eco mode that meets ADA requirements for a non-positive shut off
description: This all-in-one kit includes the Awaken G110 multifunction handshower, a 36-inch slidebar, and a 60-inch metal hose. Advanced spray performance delivers four distinct sprays - wide coverage, intense drenching, targeted massage, or reduced-flow spray - with a smooth rotation of a thumb tab. Ergonomic design makes for superior comfort and ease of use, with ideal balance and weight in the hand. The artfully sculpted sprayface reveals simple, architectural forms that complement contemporary and minimalist baths
